popNoti.text: 1. You need to get to the tuition centre. 2. Use W, A and D to move. 3. Stay in the correct lane and keep a lookout. 4. Use the phone to assist you.
popNoti.mobileText: 1. You need to get to the tuition centre. 2. Use W, A and D to move. 3. Stay in the correct lane and keep a lookout. 4. Use the phone to assist you.

popNoti.text: Stay on the correct path, avoid going to the bicycle lane.
popNoti.mobileText: Stay on the correct path, avoid going to the bicycle lane.

popNoti.text: Stay on the correct path, avoid going to the road.
popNoti.mobileText: Stay on the correct path, avoid going to towards the road.

popNoti.text: Coins are scattered around the map. Collect as much as possible.
popNoti.mobileText: Coins are scattered around the map. Collect as many as you can.

popNoti.text: Remember to stay in the correct lane and keep a lookout.
popNoti.mobileText: Remember to stay in the correct lane and keep a lookout.

popNoti.text: Traffic light ahead. Stop and wait for the green man to appear.
popNoti.mobileText: Traffic light ahead. Stop and wait for the green man to appear.

popNoti.text: Zebra crossing ahead. Stop and keep a lookout for ongoing vehicles.
popNoti.mobileText: Zebra crossing ahead. Stop and keep a lookout for ongoing vehicles.

popNoti.text: Bridge ahead. You are able to cross over the road by using it.
popNoti.mobileText: Bridge ahead. You are able to cross over the road by using it.
